response.original_title: It's Just a Lifetime: A Portrait of Craig Nuttycombe
response.overview: Harmony and dissonance. Fame and obscurity. Birds and dogs. Singer-songwriter Craig Nuttycombe has led a varied life. It's Just a Lifetime is a delightfully offbeat vérité portrait of the resilient artist, as told by two fans who lived with the musician for three autumnal weeks.
response.title: It's Just a Lifetime: A Portrait of Craig Nuttycombe
